title: ISRO Interview Preparation
body:
General Interview Tips

Preparing for an ISRO interview requires a strong foundation in your core engineering subjects. Be prepared to explain fundamental concepts clearly and concisely.

  • Know your favorite subjects well. Interviewers often start here.
  • Be honest if you don't know an answer.
  • Understand the projects you've listed on your resume in detail.
  • Stay updated with ISRO's latest missions and achievements.

More content will be added here soon!
